statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -3 \\ 12 \\ 6 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 3 \\ -8 \\ -6 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -41 \\ 11 \\ -37 \\ -22 \\ 37 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 27 \\ -7 \\ 24 \\ 14 \\ -24 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
